comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly Patrick Eneas McDonnell, an airship designer. See chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn84020274/1902-05-04/ed-... But I haven't found a reason for him to be in the news in early 1914.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: May have been a teacher or professor? That looks like a blackboard, behind him.
